title: Aetna Autism Coverage
shortDescription: Major health insurer providing comprehensive autism benefits including ABA therapy, evaluations, and coordinated care across Florida.
description: Aetna (a CVS Health company) provides health insurance coverage throughout Florida with comprehensive autism benefits. Their plans cover Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy, speech and occupational therapy, autism diagnostic evaluations, and mental health services. Aetna offers care coordination through their Autism Spectrum Disorder program to help families navigate services and find quality providers.

commonQuestions.question: Does Aetna cover ABA therapy?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes, Aetna plans in Florida must cover ABA therapy for children under 18 per state law, with annual minimums of $36,000.

commonQuestions.question: How do I get prior authorization for ABA therapy?
commonQuestions.answer: Your ABA provider submits the prior authorization request with diagnostic information and treatment plan. Aetna typically responds within 5-10 business days.

commonQuestions.question: Does Aetna have care coordinators for autism?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes, Aetna offers Autism Resource Specialists who can help coordinate care, find providers, and navigate insurance benefits at no cost to members.

commonQuestions.question: What if I disagree with a coverage decision?
commonQuestions.answer: You can file an appeal through Aetna's member services. Work with your provider to submit clinical documentation supporting medical necessity.
